meanings.definition: A movement of part of the body, especially a hand or the head, to express an idea or meaning.
meanings.sent1: She made a friendly gesture by waving her hand.
meanings.sent2: His gesture of shaking his head indicated disagreement.
meanings.sent3: The robot's gesture of high-fiving was unexpected.
meanings.sent4: Her gesture of opening the door symbolized new opportunities.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's gesture of pointing helped the students understand better.

meanings.definition: An action performed to convey a feeling or intention.
meanings.sent1: A hug can be a comforting gesture during tough times.
meanings.sent2: His gesture of giving her a flower showed his affection.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's gesture of bringing a toy was adorable.
meanings.sent4: The donation was a generous gesture towards helping others.
meanings.sent5: The handshake was a traditional gesture of sealing the deal.
